attributes.name: mask-pattern
attributes.description: A pattern against which to mask the input. Example: `{+52}(000) 000 0000` for a phone number

attributes.name: mask-regexp
attributes.description: A regular expression against which to mask the input. Example: `{+52}(000) 000 0000` for a phone number

attributes.name: mask-number
attributes.description: Mask the input as a number according to the specified options (example: `mask-number='{"thousandsSeparator: " ""}'`)
